Text: Gah!
C-Calm down! There's just one of them! Hold the line—
...Too late.
Aaaghhh!

A black shadow lurks in the darkness of the night.
Countless men who he has cut down crumble in his
wake.
Damn it... How did he figure out our plan?

He had, in fact, not figured out their plan. He had
simply been there by coincidence.
...You're the last one.
Ack! Y-You... You've slaughtered all my men!
Why are you doing this?!
Why? Isn't it obvious?
To exterminate all of you.
Exterminate...us? Who the hell do you think you are?!
And what's in it for you?!

I-Is someone paying you?! That's it, isn't it? Look,
we'll double whatever they're paying you. Sound good?

The captain desperately attempts to escape death.
However...

Heh... If you're going to beg for your worthless
life, you shouldn't have gotten involved in the first
place.

Wh-What's that?! You think you're on the side of
justice? Give me a break! Take your hero act
elsewhere!

You sure talk a lot for someone at the end of his
rope. Interesting. Let's chat.

Shadow sheathes his weapon and confronts the man
unarmed.

My path was never to pursue justice. I simply made
this my mission, and you guys happened to be my
opponents. That's all there is to it.
Shadow continues speaking.
What about you guys? Why serve the Cult of Diablos?

Why? Well, we all have our reasons. I know some who
joined because they were intrigued by the
research. Others because the pay was reasonable for
the work required.

Oh, and I think I recall one guy...who said he
enjoyed a work culture that justified violence...

(Hmmm... I never bothered hearing out one of the
baddies, but this one sounds like a regular salary
man! But the violence part is a bit...)

(But I guess he's trying to say they're also just
doing it to satisfy their selfish ends.)

(Looking at it that way, I'm no different. But some
mistake being a murderer for "justice" by convincing
themselves they're ridding the world of evil.)

(By justifying their actions, they can rationalize
pretty much anything. It's frightening, really.)

(They'll do whatever it takes to achieve their ends.
It's laughable—)
Now!

Positioned in front of the unarmed Shadow, the Cult
member perceives this as his opportunity and lunges
forward with his sword—
...Huh?
—Really.

In a flash, Shadow's lightning-fast blade beheads the
man.
Silence befalls the raucous night.

The end justifies all means. How very...human.
Likewise—

(I also intend to use any means to become a
shadowbroker.)

(After all, here I am in another world with magical
powers. It would be a waste not to enjoy it to the
fullest.)
Well, that was entertaining enough.

With a faint trace of satisfaction on his face,
Shadow disappears into the dark of night, leaving
behind the remains of the Cult members in his wake.
